Articles.Content:
How do I post screenshots with my replies? The "image" tool on the toolbar uses a URL, not a computer location.

I've got 130+ screenshots and nothing to do with them:(
You have to upload them to an image sharing site. There's photobucket.com, and imgur.com. I recommend the latter. Both free, with limitations.
Upload to an image sharing site, like Imgur or Tinypic. It should give you a url to post, so you can upload to the forums!
